titles.title: A bill to extend the date after which interest earned on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund may be available for apportionment.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 3/11/2015--Introduced. This bill amends the Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act to delay by 10 years until 2026 the date after which interest from the wildlife conservation and restoration fund is available for apportionment.
